item.title: 1. HackTheBox DIY with Rust: Delivery
item.description: Introduction This will be a series of HTB writeups, but instead of using the same boring tools as always, I will try to create my own toolset using Rust. The goal is to have fun hacking boxes and at the same time learn a new language. Some things to keep in mind: I suck at pentesting. I suck even more at Rust programming. Let’s go. Setup Hacker name The first thing we need is a hacker name.
